column4: too bad I cooked my other machine yesterday I would almost be ready to see if a newer verison of ubuntu could not kernel panic when booting on my dual socket board.
which is why that box ran XP x64 and then vista for 4 years without and issue.
so umm 11.04 doesn't dectect my multi monotor setup that 10.04 and 10.10 did out of the box... wishing I hadn't hit that upgrade button now... alot.
how hard is "roll back to 10.10" without losing data  ?
